meanings.definition: Plastocyanins: a type of blue copper protein found in plants and algae that is involved in electron transport during photosynthesis.
meanings.sent1: During photosynthesis, plastocyanins help transport electrons in plants and algae.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study plastocyanins to understand their role in photosynthesis.
meanings.sent3: The plastocyanins at the photosynthesis party were the life of the electron transport!
meanings.sent4: Like tiny blue messengers, plastocyanins deliver electrons where they are needed.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant blue color of plastocyanins makes them stand out in the world of proteins.
